title.en: Prayer for the Devoted and Diligent Ngawang Sherab1

text.en: Mañjughoṣa himself, omnipresent master of knowledge and love,2
text.en-trans: jampal yang ngö khyabdak khyentsé wang

text.en: Chökyi Lodrö whose kindness is beyond compare,
I entreat you from the depths of my heart: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: Cause me to realize co-emergent wisdom, I pray.
text.en-trans: lhenkyé yeshe tokpar dzé du sol
